description: This file defines a Flutter widget called 'EmptyState' which displays a centered icon, title, and subtitle, styled according to a custom theme.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A stateless widget representing an empty state with an icon, title, and subtitle for UI purposes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the EmptyState widget, displaying an icon, title, and subtitle centered on the screen.
